participant_1.background:
I like the weather to be a bit cooler so I can enjoy my late night walks and football games.
I wake up and spend some time meditating before I start my day.
I have a lot of flexibility in my work schedule, which allows me to go to dance lessons with my boyfriend and recycle more.
I like to read my favorite books when I have a rainy day.
i am a marathon runner.

participant_2.background:
I want to live in a safe neighborhood with good schools, so my daughter and grandchildren can grow up happy and healthy.
My family is my everything.
i love sports , but rugby is my favorite.
i am allergic to seafood.
I am retired and enjoy spending time with my family and friends.

content.text: Hi there! What is your favorite thing to do on a rainy day?
I like to curl up with a good book and a cup of tea.
That sounds lovely. I love to read too. What are some of your favorite books?
I love classic literature, like Jane Austen and Charles Dickens. I also love historical fiction.
I love historical fiction too! What are some of your favorite historical fiction books?
I recently read "The Nightingale" by Kristin Hannah and I really enjoyed it. It's about two sisters during World War II.
I've heard good things about that book. I'll have to check it out.
You should! It's a really good read.
What are some other things you enjoy doing on a rainy day?
I also like to watch movies or play board games.
Me too! I love board games. What are some of your favorites?
I like Scrabble, Monopoly, and Risk.
Those are all great games! I love playing Monopoly with my family.
Me too! It's always a fun time.
It sounds like we have a lot in common. I'd love to get to know you better.
Me too! I'm always looking for new friends.
